work.name: Gusto
highlights: Developed and launched a full stack feature that enabled Gusto’s applicant tracking system to create job postings that consist of multiple hiring locations.
Helped scale Gusto’s applicant tracking system which made it easier to use for over 2000 use cases.

work.name: Solvvy (Acquired by Zoom)
highlights: Worked in a fast-growing startup focusing on machine learning and customer experience.

Created a critical full stack web application for internal users to more efficiently and securely search, view, and manage client accounts or data. In addition saving client facing employees over 50 hours per week.

work.name: Taiwan Mask Corp
highlights: Implemented an application to assist in flagging and detecting complicated issues with photomask designs for quality and assurance during manufacturing.
Created a lunch ordering system web application used daily by over 200 employees to order lunch online and have it automatically deducted from their payroll.

work.name: Cisco
highlights: Designed a comprehensive dashboard that provided employees insight into the performance of a tool integral to Cisco’s compliance and risk management with third party software.
Maintained and wrote important queries and scripts that helped manage and analyze complex data for different teams.

work.name: Santa Clara University Marketing and Communications
highlights: Built an automated web scraper that can compile months worth of data from social media accounts of competing universities allowing the team to save thousands per month.
Created a dashboard that would automatically update based on the data that is automatically collected allowing for easily generated comprehensive reports.

courses: Teaching Assistant for Introduction to Computer Science (CSCI 10)
